alert.note: Alert for Mora; San Miguel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 16 at 9:18PM MDT until June 16 at 11:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... The Hermits Peak-Calf Canyon burn scar in... Southwestern Mora County in northeastern New Mexico... Northwestern San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 1130 PM MDT. * At 918 PM MDT, Doppler radar continued to indicate scattered thunderstorms producing locally heavy rain over the Hermits Peak-Calf Canyon Burn Scar. Radar estimates between 0.5 and 1.25 inches of rain has fallen with additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.75 inches possible in the warned area. The threat for burn scar flash flooding expected to continue through the late evening. HAZARD...Excessive rainfall over the Hermits Peak-Calf Canyon Burn Scar will continue, including portions of Sapello River and nearby creeks. . SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Runoff from heavy rainfall will create flash flooding and possible debris flows over the Calf Canyon-Hermits Peak wildfire burn scar. The debris flows can consist of large masses of water, ash, soot, wildfire debris, rock, mud, vegetation and other loose materials. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sapello, Tierra Monte, Ledoux, Morphy Lake State Park, Gascon, Watrous, Manuelitas, San Ignacio in Guadalupe County, South Carmen, Rociada and Monte Aplanado. This includes the following highways... State Road 94 between Mile Markers 1 and 17. State Road 518 between Mile Markers 9 and 20. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Runoff from rainfall will cause elevated water levels within vulnerable drainages in and downstream of the Hermits Peak-Calf Canyon Burn Scar area. To report flooding, contact the National Weather Service office in Albuquerque at 1.888.386.7637 when you can do so safely.
